peering.policy:
This document defines how to connect with Crestline Networks (AS396015), specifying requirements and the factors that influence peering decisions with third parties.

Crestline Networks follows a selective, settlement-free peering policy. Crestline Networks peers with other organizations based on:

* Current and projected inter-network traffic volumes.

* The number of locations where both parties are present.

* The presence of mutual benefit for establishing peering.

* The peerâ€™s compliance with our technical and legal requirement

* Crestline Networks reviews this policy periodically and may change it at any time.
require: Maintain a complete and current PeeringDB entry.
Register all announced prefixes in at least one recognized public IRR.
Do not advertise our prefixes to any transit provider.
Announce to us only your own and your customers prefixes.
Accept that AS20473 may selectively withdraw prefixes on public IXPs to protect service quality.
Give advance notice of scheduled maintenance.
peering.notes: Contact peering@ for coordination. ASNs without PeeringDB may be delayed.
